basic.description: An overview of the principles and processes of nursing research. By the end of the course the student will have developed the ability to identify researchable problems. The student will be able to critique and make decisions about the applicability of published nursing research. The student will acquire the knowledge necessary for beginning participation as a junior member of a nursing research project. 3 hours per week; 9 units (3 credits) course weight.
basic.subject: NURS
basic.title: Nur Prin & Applic Of Nur Rsch

extra.enrollment_requirement: Exclusions: HLTH252.  Registration in a NURS-N-BCH Academic Program is required.
